POST / HTTP/1.1

        "ins-cri8d02t"
    ]
}

POST / HTTP/1.1

    ]

将应用型负载均衡器lb-23aejgcv（监听器为lbl-ncw704sn，转发路径为loc-l3hmaev9）添加到伸缩组

CancelInstanceRefresh.document: 取消伸缩组 asg-h7tgd87d 的实例刷新活动 asr-juhf6ytr
CancelInstanceRefresh.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: as.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CancelInstanceRefresh
<公共请求参数>

{
    "AutoScalingGroupId": "asg-h7tgd87d",
    "RefreshActivityId": "asr-juhf6ytr"
}
CancelInstanceRefresh.title: 取消实例刷新活动

ClearLaunchConfigurationAttributes.document: 指定启动配置asc-kr4beurf，入参ClearDataDisks设置为true，接口调用后启动配置中的数据盘信息被清空，后续基于asc-kr4beurf创建的云主机将不再分配任何数据盘
ClearLaunchConfigurationAttributes.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: as.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ClearLaunchConfigurationAttributes
<公共请求参数>

{
    "LaunchConfigurationId": "asc-kr4beurf",
    "ClearDataDisks": true
}
ClearLaunchConfigurationAttributes.title: 清空启动配置中的数据盘项

CompleteLifecycleAction.document: 通过InstanceId参数，完成指定实例的生命周期挂钩
CompleteLifecycleAction.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: as.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CompleteLifecycleAction
<公共请求参数>

{
    "InstanceId": "ins-ni8bpmve",
    "LifecycleActionResult": "CONTINUE",
    "LifecycleHookId": "ash-fbjiexz7"
}
CompleteLifecycleAction.title: 完成生命周期动作，通过InstanceId调用

CompleteLifecycleAction.document: 通过LifecycleActionToken参数，完成指定实例的生命周期挂钩，生命周期挂钩发送给TDMQ的通知消息中包含LifecycleActionToken参数
CompleteLifecycleAction.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: as.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CompleteLifecycleAction
<公共请求参数>

{
    "LifecycleActionResult": "CONTINUE",
    "LifecycleHookId": "ash-fbjiexz7",
    "LifecycleActionToken": "4d910016-2590-444d-8f4a-c14940036902"
}
CompleteLifecycleAction.title: 完成生命周期动作，通过LifecycleActionToken调用

CreateAutoScalingGroup.document: 创建伸缩组，VPC网络，配置7层负载均衡器
CreateAutoScalingGroup.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: as.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateAutoScalingGroup
<公共请求参数>

{
    "VpcId": "vpc-hy436tmc",
    "DesiredCapacity": "0",
    "LaunchConfigurationId": "asc-7vucy6ae",
    "ProjectId": "0",
    "SubnetIds": [
        "subnet-b0vxjhot",
        "subnet-3tmerl37"
    ],
    "AutoScalingGroupName": "asg-vpc-7layer-lb",
    "DefaultCooldown": "300",
    "MinSize": "0",
    "MaxSize": "10",
    "TerminationPolicies": [
        "OLDEST_INSTANCE"
    ],
    "ForwardLoadBalancers": [
        {
            "TargetAttributes": [
                {
                    "Port": "8080",
                    "Weight": "10"
                }
            ],
            "Region": "ap-guangzhou",
            "LocationId": "loc-l3hmaev9",
            "ListenerId": "lbl-ncw704sn",
            "LoadBalancerId": "lb-23aejgcv"
        }
    ]
}
CreateAutoScalingGroup.title: 创建伸缩组

CreateAutoScalingGroupFromInstance.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: as.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateAutoScalingGroupFromInstance
<公共请求参数>

{
    "DesiredCapacity": 0,
    "InstanceId": "ins-19a14o9y",
    "AutoScalingGroupName": "as-test",
    "MinSize": 0,
    "MaxSize": 1,
    "InheritInstanceTag": false
}
CreateAutoScalingGroupFromInstance.title: 根据实例创建启动配置及伸缩组

CreateLaunchConfiguration.document: 只传必传的启动配置名称，实例机型，镜像ID，其他均采用系统默认值，具体配置如下：启动配置名称为：as_test，实例机型为：标准2型 1C1G（S2.SMALL1），镜像ID为：img-8toqc6s3。
CreateLaunchConfiguration.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: as.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateLaunchConfiguration
<公共请求参数>

{
    "ImageId": "img-8toqc6s3",
    "InstanceType": "S2.SMALL1",
    "LaunchConfigurationName": "as_test"
}
CreateLaunchConfiguration.title: 简单参数创建

CreateLaunchConfiguration.document: 启动配置名称为：as_test，镜像ID为：img-8toqc6s3，选择机型为：标准2型 1C1G（S2.SMALL1），系统盘选择 50G 本地硬盘，数据盘选择100G 普通云硬盘，实例销毁时不保留数据盘，数据盘不加密，公网付费模式为流量按小时后付费，外网带宽上限 5 Mbps，分配公网IP，选择密钥登录，安装云监控云安全。
CreateLaunchConfiguration.title: 详细参数创建

CreateLaunchConfiguration.document: 启动配置名称为：spot-test，机型为：标准2型 2C4G（S2.MEDIUM4），计费配置为竞价（SPOTPAID），最高出价为0.99元/小时。
CreateLaunchConfiguration.title: 创建竞价实例配置

CreateLaunchConfiguration.document: 支持两种实例机型，分别是S2.SMALL2和S2.SMALL4
CreateLaunchConfiguration.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: as.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateLaunchConfiguration
<公共请求参数>

{
    "ImageId": "img-8toqc6s3",
    "InstanceTypes": [
        "S2.SMALL4",
        "S2.SMALL2"
    ],
    "LaunchConfigurationName": "multi_instance_types"
}
CreateLaunchConfiguration.title: 创建启动配置，支持多种实例机型

CreateLifecycleHook.document: 创建生命周期挂钩，在实例创建场景下生效，DefaultResult设置为ABANDON，HeartbeatTimeout设置为360秒。
CreateLifecycleHook.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: as.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateLifecycleHook
<公共请求参数>

{
    "AutoScalingGroupId": "asg-8fbozqja",
    "DefaultResult": "ABANDON",
    "LifecycleHookName": "one-hook",
    "LifecycleTransition": "INSTANCE_LAUNCHING",
    "HeartbeatTimeout": "360"
}
CreateLifecycleHook.title: 创建生命周期挂钩

CreateLifecycleHook.document: 创建生命周期挂钩，在实例创建场景下生效。DefaultResult采用默认值，即CONTINUE。HeartbeatTimeout采用默认值，即300秒。
CreateLifecycleHook.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: as.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateLifecycleHook
<公共请求参数>

{
    "AutoScalingGroupId": "asg-8fbozqja",
    "LifecycleHookName": "one-hook-default",
    "LifecycleTransition": "INSTANCE_LAUNCHING"
}
CreateLifecycleHook.title: 创建生命周期挂钩，采用默认值

CreateLifecycleHook.document: 创建生命周期挂钩，在实例销毁场景下生效，DefaultResult设置为ABANDON，HeartbeatTimeout设置为120秒，通知名为“one-topic”的TDMQ主题模型。
CreateLifecycleHook.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: as.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateLifecycleHook
<公共请求参数>

{
    "HeartbeatTimeout": "120",
    "AutoScalingGroupId": "asg-8fbozqja",
    "LifecycleHookName": "terminate-topic",
    "NotificationMetadata": "topic",
    "NotificationTarget": {
        "TargetType": "TDMQ_TOPIC",
        "TopicName": "one-topic"
    },
    "DefaultResult": "ABANDON",
    "LifecycleTransition": "INSTANCE_TERMINATING"
}
CreateLifecycleHook.title: 创建生命周期挂钩，通知TDMQ主题模型

CreateLifecycleHook.document: 创建生命周期挂钩，在实例创建场景下生效，DefaultResult设置为CONTINUE，HeartbeatTimeout设置为120秒，通知名为“one-queue”的TDMQ队列模型。
CreateLifecycleHook.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: as.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateLifecycleHook
<公共请求参数>

{
    "HeartbeatTimeout": "120",
    "AutoScalingGroupId": "asg-8fbozqja",
    "LifecycleHookName": "launch-queue",
    "NotificationMetadata": "queue",
    "NotificationTarget": {
        "TargetType": "TDMQ_QUEUE",
        "QueueName": "one-queue"
    },
    "DefaultResult": "CONTINUE",
    "LifecycleTransition": "INSTANCE_LAUNCHING"
}
CreateLifecycleHook.title: 创建生命周期挂钩，通知TDMQ队列模型

CreateLifecycleHook.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: as.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateLifecycleHook
<公共请求参数>

{
    "HeartbeatTimeout": "300",
    "AutoScalingGroupId": "asg-mp5ydedh",
    "LifecycleCommand": {
        "CommandId": "cmd-id9u919l",
        "Parameters": "{\"var1\":\"ck\"}"
    },
    "LifecycleHookName": "demo2",
    "DefaultResult": "CONTINUE",
    "LifecycleTransition": "INSTANCE_LAUNCHING"
}
CreateLifecycleHook.title: 创建执行自动化助手命令的生命周期挂钩

CreateNotificationConfiguration.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: as.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateNotificationConfiguration
<公共请求参数>

{

        "1678"
    ],
    "NotificationTypes": [
        "SCALE_OUT_FAILED",

CreateNotificationConfiguration.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: as.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateNotificationConfiguration
<公共请求参数>

{
    "AutoScalingGroupId": "asg-pc2oqu2z",
    "NotificationTypes": [
        "SCALE_OUT_FAILED"
    ],
    "TargetType": "CMQ_QUEUE",
    "QueueName": "test-queue"

CreateScalingPolicy.document: 1分钟内，CPU平均利用率大于50%，连续发生5次，期望实例数增加1。
CreateScalingPolicy.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: as.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateScalingPolicy
<公共请求参数>

{
    "AutoScalingGroupId": "asg-12wjuh0s",
    "Cooldown": "60",
    "ScalingPolicyType": "SIMPLE",
    "ScalingPolicyName": "cpu_policy_test",
    "AdjustmentType": " CHANGE_IN_CAPACITY",
    "MetricAlarm": {
        "Period": "60",
        "ContinuousTime": "5",
        "ComparisonOperator": "GREATER_THAN",
        "Statistic": "AVERAGE",
        "Threshold": "50",
        "MetricName": "CPU_UTILIZATION"
    },
    "NotificationUserGroupIds": [
        "1678"
    ],
    "AdjustmentValue": "1"
}
CreateScalingPolicy.title: 创建简单策略： CPU 平均利用率

CreateScalingPolicy.document: 1分钟内，内存平均利用率小于35%，连续发生5次，减少50%实例。
CreateScalingPolicy.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: as.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateScalingPolicy
<公共请求参数>

{
    "AutoScalingGroupId": "asg-12wjuh0s",
    "Cooldown": "300",
    "ScalingPolicyType": "SIMPLE",
    "ScalingPolicyName": "mem_policy_test",
    "AdjustmentType": " PERCENT_CHANGE_IN_CAPACITY",
    "MetricAlarm": {
        "Period": "60",
        "ContinuousTime": "5",
        "ComparisonOperator": "LESS_THAN",
        "Statistic": "AVERAGE",
        "Threshold": "50",
        "MetricName": "MEM_UTILIZATION"
    },
    "NotificationUserGroupIds": [
        "1678"
    ],
    "AdjustmentValue": "-50"
}
CreateScalingPolicy.title: 创建简单策略：内存平均利用率

CreateScalingPolicy.document: 保持伸缩组 CPU 平均利用率接近60%，告警触发的扩容实例预热300秒，关闭禁用缩容。
CreateScalingPolicy.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: as.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateScalingPolicy
<公共请求参数>

{
    "AutoScalingGroupId": "asg-9dn1a5y6",
    "ScalingPolicyName": "cpu_target_tracking_test",
    "ScalingPolicyType": "TARGET_TRACKING",
    "PredefinedMetricType": "ASG_AVG_CPU_UTILIZATION",
    "EstimatedInstanceWarmup": 300,
    "DisableScaleIn": false,
    "TargetValue": 60
}
CreateScalingPolicy.title: 创建目标追踪策略：CPU 平均利用率

CreateScheduledAction.document: 创建定时任务，在指定时间（北京时间2018年8月28日23点）调整伸缩组的最大实例数、最小实例数和期望实例数至 10、4、6。
CreateScheduledAction.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: as.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateScheduledAction
<公共请求参数>

{
    "DesiredCapacity": "6",
    "AutoScalingGroupId": "asg-2nr9xh8h",
    "MinSize": "4",
    "MaxSize": "10",
    "ScheduledActionName": "scheduled-action-0",
    "StartTime": "2018-08-28T23:00:00+08:00"
}
CreateScheduledAction.title: 创建单次执行的定时任务

CreateScheduledAction.document: 创建定时任务，从北京时间2018年8月28日开始，每天 23:00 调整伸缩组的最大实例数、最小实例数和期望实例数至 7、2、3，在北京时间2019年1月1日 00:00 后结束。
CreateScheduledAction.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: as.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateScheduledAction
<公共请求参数>

{
    "Recurrence": "0 23 */1 * *",
    "DesiredCapacity": "3",
    "AutoScalingGroupId": "asg-2nr9xh8h",
    "MinSize": "2",
    "MaxSize": "7",
    "ScheduledActionName": "scheduled-action-1",
    "StartTime": "2018-08-28T23:00:00+08:00",
    "EndTime": "2019-01-01T00:00:00+08:00"
}
CreateScheduledAction.title: 创建重复执行的定时任务

DetachLoadBalancers.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: as.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DetachLoadBalancers

UpgradeLaunchConfiguration.document: 启动配置名称为：as_test，镜像ID为：img-8toqc6s3，选择机型为：标准2型 1C1G（S2.SMALL1），系统盘选择 50G 本地硬盘，数据盘选择100G 普通云硬盘，公网付费模式为流量按小时后付费，外网带宽上限 5 Mbps，分配公网IP，选择密钥登录，安装云监控云安全。
